name: The Disgaea Triple Play Collection
summary: The Disgaea Triple Play Collection is an incredible 3-game collection of strategy RPG's on PlayStation 3. Included are Disgaea 3: Absence of Justice (originally released in North America on August 3, 2008), Disgaea 4: A Promise Unforgotten (September 6, 2011), and Disgaea D2: A Brighter Darkness (October 8, 2013), all on one glorious disc!
